options.content: Toolkit on $node_name ? Help Configuration Home

targets.query: meta.id.keyword: localhost AND !meta.labels.name.keyword: perfsonar-generate_motd.service AND !meta.labels.name.keyword: perfsonar-configure_nic_parameters.service AND values.node_systemd_unit_state: * AND meta.labels.state.keyword: active

meta.id.keyword: localhost AND !meta.labels.name.keyword: perfsonar-generate_motd.service AND !meta.labels.name.keyword: perfsonar-configure_nic_parameters.service AND values.node_systemd_unit_state: * AND meta.labels.state.keyword: active
type.keyword: perfsonar_host AND meta.id.keyword: localhost AND values.perfsonar_pscheduler_runs: *
type.keyword: perfsonar_host AND meta.id.keyword: localhost AND values.perfsonar_pscheduler_archiving: *
type.keyword: perfsonar_host AND meta.id.keyword: localhost AND values.perfsonar_pscheduler_paused: *
type.keyword: perfsonar_host AND meta.id.keyword: localhost AND  values.perfsonar_pscheduler_http_queue: *
